version_description:
--Be on time with Flight Board--
• Yes, we read your requests for a new Design! We worked hard on this new Design and hope you like it...
• And we've fixed the bug that was assisting you with locating nearby airports
• And we’ve fixed some small problems to improve the stability & performance of the App.

--Be on time with Flight Board--
• We've added the name of the Airline to the Flight Details.
• And we’ve fixed some small bugs to improve the stability & performance of the App.

--Be on time with Flight Board--
• We've fixed some small bugs to improve the stability & performance of the App.

-- BE ON TIME WITH FLIGHT BOARD --
• Shows flights from 30 minutes in the past
• We're now supporting Sorting on Gate, Flight Number, Flight status and Time
• Fixed this Bug: Flight Detail Page showed sometimes PM when it was AM and vice versa
• Landscape mode for iPhone

-- BE ON TIME WITH FLIGHT BOARD --
• Fixing AM/PM bug in Flight Details; it was always showing AM

As always, we appreciate your feedback. Please email us at feedback@impalastudios.com with any suggestions or questions.
If you are happy with this update, please let us know by rating and reviewing us in the App Store!

-- BE ON TIME WITH FLIGHT BOARD --
• We worked on optimising the app in terms of the weather data.

• Check out our new app preview video! 
• Every update makes Flight Board better looking and better working

As always, we appreciate your feedback. Please keep sharing your experience to feedback@impalastudios.com
Do you love this update? Please rate and review Flight Board in the App Store!

• We've updated the flight service to make the app faster and even more reliable
• We've prepped the app for iPhone X
• Thanks for using Flight Board! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

• Check out our new App Preview!
• Thanks for using Flight Board! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.
• We’ve fixed some small bugs to improve the stability & performance of the app.
• Thanks for using Flight Board Pro! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.
• We’ve fixed some small bugs to improve the stability & performance of the app
• The Flight Boards will upload faster now, we’ve updated the Flight Data.
• Thanks for using Flight Board Pro! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.
• We’ve updated the data security connections

• We've updated the data and added 120 new airlines and 20 new airports!
• We've added iPhone X marketing material
Be on time with Flight Board!
• We've fixed a crash occurring on IOS 8

Thank you for using Flight Board! 
• This version contains minor bug fixes

• We update our app regularly to fix small bugs that you wouldn’t necessarily notice. - Thank you for your continued support! - We highly appreciate your feedback, so don’t hesitate to contact us at feedback@impalastudios.com with any suggestions or questions.

• Our prime goal is to improve continuously and make your experience better with every update; This version contains minor bug fixes.

Thank you for your continued support! We highly appreciate your feedback, so don’t hesitate to contact us at feedback@impalastudios.com with any suggestions or questions.
• Another update arrived! We’ve ironed out some bugs and made some improvements that you as a user would not necessarily notice. Don’t miss out your flight information and always be on time

Get iOS-13 Ready!  We have optimized the app for a seamless iOS-13 experience.  

Thank you for your continuous support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via feedback@impalastudios.com.
We flew through the app and fixed bugs along the way. Update quickly, open the app and then you are back on track! Will we see you again in the next flight?

• Our prime goal is to improve continuously and make your experience better with every update; This version contains minor bug fixes.

Thank you for your continued support! We highly appreciate your feedback, so don’t hesitate to contact us at feedback@impalastudios.com with any suggestions or questions.

• Our prime goal is to improve continuously and make your experience better with every update; This version contains minor bug fixes.

Thank you for your continued support! We highly appreciate your feedback, so don’t hesitate to contact us at feedback@impalastudios.com with any suggestions or questions.

Thank you for your continued support! We highly appreciate your feedback, so don’t hesitate to contact us at feedback@impalastudios.com with any suggestions or questions.

Small but important improvements in this update!
What's changed? Performance improvements and small bug fixes aimed to enhance your experience.
See even more potential? Please reach out to us to share your ideas and suggestions at feedback@impalastudios.com.

Small but important improvements in this update!
What's changed? Performance improvements, small bug fixes aimed to enhance your experience and
we've updated to the data security connections to protect personal data.

See even more potential? Please reach out to us to share your ideas and suggestions at feedback@impalastudios.com.
